mapper.sql: a.inv_tran_no, a.mat_no, a.wh_id, a.tran_reason, a.tran_qty, a.inv_tran_audit_status, a.new_mat_status, a.old_mat_status, a.tran_user, a.tran_date, a.memo, a.cr_user, a.cr_time, a.md_user, a.md_time, a.srl_no, b.tag_no, b.ven_sn, b.fa_no, isnull(c.mat_name, a.mat_no) mat_name, isnull(d.wh_name, a.wh_id) wh_name, isnull(e.chn_nm, a.tran_user) tran_user_name, isnull(f.name, a.tran_reason) tran_reason_dscr, isnull(g.name, a.inv_tran_audit_status) inv_tran_audit_status_dscr, isnull(h.name, a.new_mat_status) new_mat_status_dscr, isnull(i.name, a.old_mat_status) old_mat_status_dscr
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from TB_INV_STAT_TRAN a left join TB_INV_SRL b on b.srl_no = a.srl_no left join TB_INV_MATERIAL c on c.mat_no = a.mat_no left join TB_INV_WAREHOUSE d on d.wh_id = a.wh_id left join TB_AUTH_PERSONNEL e on e.psn_no = a.tran_user left join TB_SYS_LOOKUP f on f.type = 'INV_STAT_TRAN_RESN' and f.code = a.tran_reason left join TB_SYS_LOOKUP g on g.type = 'INV_TRAN_AUDIT_STAT' and g.code = a.inv_tran_audit_status left join TB_SYS_LOOKUP h on h.type = 'MAT_STATUS' and h.code = cast(a.new_mat_status as varchar(50)) left join TB_SYS_LOOKUP i on i.type = 'MAT_STATUS' and i.code = cast(a.old_mat_status as varchar(50))
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from TB_INV_STAT_TRAN a left join TB_INV_SRL b on b.srl_no = a.srl_no left join TB_INV_MATERIAL c on c.mat_no = a.mat_no left join TB_INV_WAREHOUSE d on d.wh_id = a.wh_id left join TB_AUTH_PERSONNEL e on e.psn_no = a.tran_user left join TB_SYS_LOOKUP f on f.type = 'INV_STAT_TRAN_RESN' and f.code = a.tran_reason left join TB_SYS_LOOKUP g on g.type = 'INV_TRAN_AUDIT_STAT' and g.code = a.inv_tran_audit_status left join TB_SYS_LOOKUP h on h.type = 'MAT_STATUS' and h.code = cast(a.new_mat_status as varchar(50)) left join TB_SYS_LOOKUP i on i.type = 'MAT_STATUS' and i.code = cast(a.old_mat_status as varchar(50)) where inv_tran_no = #{inv_tran_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_INV_STAT_TRAN (inv_tran_no, mat_no, wh_id, tran_reason, tran_qty, inv_tran_audit_status, new_mat_status, old_mat_status, tran_user, tran_date, memo, cr_user, cr_time, md_user, md_time, srl_no) values (#{inv_tran_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tran_reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tran_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inv_tran_audit_status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{new_mat_status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{old_mat_status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{tran_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tran_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{srl_no,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into TB_INV_STAT_TRAN
inv_tran_no,
mat_no,
wh_id,
tran_reason,
tran_qty,
inv_tran_audit_status,
new_mat_status,
old_mat_status,
tran_user,
tran_date,
memo,
cr_user,
cr_time,
md_user,
md_time,
srl_no,

mapper.update:
update TB_INV_STAT_TRAN a
inv_tran_no = #{record.inv_tran_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mat_no = #{record.mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wh_id = #{record.wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tran_reason = #{record.tran_reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tran_qty = #{record.tran_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inv_tran_audit_status = #{record.inv_tran_audit_status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
new_mat_status = #{record.new_mat_status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
old_mat_status = #{record.old_mat_status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
tran_user = #{record.tran_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tran_date = #{record.tran_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
memo = #{record.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_user = #{record.cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_time = #{record.cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
md_user = #{record.md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
md_time = #{record.md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
srl_no = #{record.srl_no,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update TB_INV_STAT_TRAN a set inv_tran_no = #{record.inv_tran_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mat_no = #{record.mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wh_id = #{record.wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tran_reason = #{record.tran_reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tran_qty = #{record.tran_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inv_tran_audit_status = #{record.inv_tran_audit_status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, new_mat_status = #{record.new_mat_status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, old_mat_status = #{record.old_mat_status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, tran_user = #{record.tran_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tran_date = #{record.tran_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, memo = #{record.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_user = #{record.cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_time = #{record.cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, md_user = #{record.md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md_time = #{record.md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, srl_no = #{record.srl_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update TB_INV_STAT_TRAN
mat_no = #{mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wh_id = #{wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tran_reason = #{tran_reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tran_qty = #{tran_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inv_tran_audit_status = #{inv_tran_audit_status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
new_mat_status = #{new_mat_status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
old_mat_status = #{old_mat_status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
tran_user = #{tran_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tran_date = #{tran_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_user = #{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_time = #{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
md_user = #{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
md_time = #{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
srl_no = #{srl_no,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where inv_tran_no = #{inv_tran_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TB_INV_STAT_TRAN set mat_no = #{mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wh_id = #{wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tran_reason = #{tran_reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tran_qty = #{tran_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inv_tran_audit_status = #{inv_tran_audit_status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, new_mat_status = #{new_mat_status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, old_mat_status = #{old_mat_status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, tran_user = #{tran_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tran_date = #{tran_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_user = #{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_time = #{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, md_user = #{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md_time = #{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, srl_no = #{srl_no,jdbcType=BIGINT} where inv_tran_no = #{inv_tran_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
